dct_description_sm: State 1, Variant “N. V.” [erasure of N.IV.] (top right), otherwise same as state 1. Issued on one sheet with same maps as mentioned in State 1 publication, with some slight changes. The small diagrams on the world map are missing their figure numbers, the Africa map has “N.IIII” instead of “N.III”, and several other maps are renumbered. Title along top of sheet: Historisch=Geographische Charte für die ersten Anfänger in der Geographie und Historie. zum Gebrauch der Real-Schule in Berlin. Die Erläuterung dazu ist besonders gedruckt.
Small map showing California as an island, with river to the east joining the Mississippi. "Terra Esonis incog:" and "Fret. Anian" to northwest.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
